meanings.definition: A set of circumstances that makes it possible to do something.
meanings.sent1: The school play was the perfect opportunity for me to showcase my acting skills.
meanings.sent2: She saw an opportunity to help her friend and immediately offered assistance.
meanings.sent3: Missing the bus was actually a great opportunity to enjoy a leisurely walk to work.
meanings.sent4: In the world of business, every closed door is an opportunity waiting to be opened.
meanings.sent5: The opportunity to travel abroad presented itself unexpectedly, and she seized it with excitement.

meanings.definition: A chance for advancement or progress.
meanings.sent1: Winning the scholarship was a great opportunity for him to further his education.
meanings.sent2: She believed that every challenge was an opportunity to learn and grow.
meanings.sent3: Losing his phone turned out to be an opportunity to disconnect from technology for a while.
meanings.sent4: Each setback he faced was an opportunity to prove his resilience and determination.
meanings.sent5: The job promotion was the perfect opportunity for her to showcase her leadership skills.

meanings.sent1: The sunny weather provided the perfect opportunity for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent2: He saw the rainy day as an opportunity to stay indoors and read a good book.
meanings.sent3: Getting stuck in traffic gave him the opportunity to listen to his favorite podcast.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected snowfall created a beautiful opportunity for a winter wonderland adventure.
meanings.sent5: The holiday season is a wonderful opportunity to spend time with loved ones and create lasting memories.
